info.name: Nexscholar API - Complete Import
info.description:
Complete API collection for Nexscholar platform data management. Import this to add all requests to your collection.

**Base URL:** {{base_url}}/api
**Authentication:** Bearer Token (obtained from /login endpoint)

**Setup Instructions:**
1. Import this collection
2. Set the base_url variable to http://127.0.0.1:8000
3. Run the Login request to get your token
4. Token is automatically saved to collection variable

request.description: Login to obtain Bearer token. Token is automatically saved to collection variables.

request.description:
Create a new postgraduate program.

**Required Fields:**
- name (string, max 255)
- program_type (required)
- university_id (must exist)
- faculty_id (must exist)

**Optional Fields:**
- description (string)
- duration_years (string, max 100)
- funding_info (string, max 255)
- application_url (string, max 2048)
- country (string, max 100)
Get specific program details by ID
Update program (uses POST instead of PUT for file upload support)
Delete a postgraduate program
Get list of all universities

Create a new university.

**Required Fields:**
- full_name (string, max 255, unique)
- short_name (string, max 50, unique)
- country (string, max 100)

**Optional Fields:**
- university_category (string)
- university_type (string)
- profile_picture (image file: jpeg, png, jpg, gif, max 2MB)
- background_image (image file: jpeg, png, jpg, gif, max 2MB)
Get specific university details
Update university (uses POST instead of PUT)
Delete a university
Get list of all faculties

Create a new faculty.

**Required Fields:**
- name (string, max 255, unique per university)
- university_id (integer, must exist in university_list)
Get specific faculty details
Update faculty (uses POST instead of PUT)
Delete a faculty
